description: Ten states have passed laws to ban the practice of lying to juveniles in custody during police interrogations. Now, one state wants to extend the ban to adults too.
title: It's legal for police to use deception in interrogations. Advocates want that to end

description: Ben, Kirk Herbstreit's certified emotional support animal, had been diagnosed with cancer earlier this year. Audiences grew to love the 10-year-old golden retriever who appeared on TV with his owner.
title: ESPN host Kirk Herbstreit's beloved game day-crashing dog, Ben, has died

description: After Trump's win, there are growing calls among American women to boycott men. They're drawing inspiration from 4B, a South Korean feminist movement that rejects dating, sex, marriage and childbirth.
title: Boycott men? South Korea's 4B movement gains traction in the U.S. after Trump's win

description: Edwards recorded the iconic AOL lines at home with a cassette recorder for $200. Little did he know, he would become the voice that welcomed millions of people to the world of email.
title: Elwood Edwards, the voice of AOL's 'You've got mail' alert, dies at 74

description: Vice President Harris had hoped young voters would be a key part of a winning coalition. Instead, they shifted — sometimes by double digits — toward President-elect Trump, especially in  swing states.
title: Biden won big with young voters. This year, they swung toward Trump in a big way

description: Soccer fans from Israel were attacked in Amsterdam in what the Dutch prime minister called "antisemitic attacks on Israeli citizens."
title: Israeli soccer fans were attacked in Amsterdam

description: President-elect Donald Trump has appointed Susie Wiles as his White House chief of staff. And, here's a dive into what his first 100 days in office could look like based on his campaign promises.
title: What Trump’s first days in office could be like. And, world leaders react to his win

description: About two dozen chimpanzees deemed too feeble to be moved a few years ago will be going to Chimp Haven after all. The NIH said originally they'd be kept in New Mexico for their own safety.
title: Frail chimps headed from New Mexico to Louisiana sanctuary

description: Have you recently dumped a partner over their politics? Or chosen to stay friends with someone who voted differently this year? NPR wants to hear how politics have impacted relationships.
title: Do you have a loved one who votes differently than you? Tell NPR about it

description: This week's quiz includes the great, the late and the clickbait.
title: Honey, a new pygmy hippo just dropped! The quiz has your animal news covered

description: Trump not only won in the Electoral College, but he won so big that he expanded his coalition with historic demographic shifts.
title: Why Trump won — 9 takeaways from the 2024 election

description: A federal judge on Thursday struck down a Biden administration policy that aimed to ease a path to citizenship for some undocumented immigrants who are married to U.S. citizens.
title: Judge strikes down Biden program shielding immigrant spouses from deportation

description: Three people have been charged in connection with the death of Liam Payne, a former member of musical group One Direction who died after falling from his Buenos Aires hotel room balcony last month.
title: Argentine prosecutors charge 3 people in connection with singer Liam Payne's death

description: The delivery of the bells comes just one month ahead of Notre Dame's reopening, which is scheduled for December 8.
title: Notre Dame welcomes arrival of 3 new bells as cathedral reopening nears
